**Reasoning:**
- The line item representing the "amount owed by the entity for goods or services received or purchased on credit during the period" is "Accounts Payable".
- From the balance sheet, "Accounts Payable" increased from 0.00 on 2023-12-31 to 2,100,000.00 on 2024-01-30.
